content:
{"name": "Suthers Center Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* All assistance must be made in person.

* Located at the parking lot of St. Martin Episcopal Church. Parking lot opens at 7:50 a.m. and will close at 10:00 a.m. to accommodate clients in line.

Clients will be screened based on the food bank forms:
https://www.acfb.org/wp-content/uploads/TEFAP-832-Distribution-Report-Rev-10-2021-P.pdf
https://www.acfb.org/wp-content/uploads/2023GNAP-Single-Family-Intake-V3.23.23.1.pdf
https://www.acfb.org/wp-content/uploads/2023GNAP-Multi-Family-Intake-V2.27.23.1.pdf", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sutherscenter.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3110 Ashford Dunwoody Road Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30319", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8798235, "longitude": -84.3278898}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 228-0777", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}]}
